Rat Trap watches as Tucson's chest glows brighter by the moment with each p=
ulsation of his heart spark. He thinks for a moment, as does Night Shift, w=
ho seems to get the same idea as Rat Trap.

"You thinkn' what I'm thinkn' B=
lackie?"

Night Shift nodds.

"Looks like it, rodent bot.  That energy, the=
 one commn' from his chest...  I bet it can be channeled inta one bot from =
the other, via the chest port..  That power's tryn' ta reach somethn' and I=
 wonder if it's tryn' ta reach Rodimus's core where his matrix was."

Befor=
e anyone could think, in his state of unconsciousness, Tucson extends his h=
and out as far as he can, hoping that it will touch upon Rodimus's hand, ev=
en if it were only his fingers.  He begins to talk in his sleep.

"Just - a=
 hand - a - way.  Just - a hand a way."

He fights hard to extend his arm f=
ar enough to attempt to feel Rodimus's hand.
